players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night. He's been playing us all along."
Charlie: "I'm innocent and I didn't kill Bob. The real killer is still out there."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso I investigated last night. He's been playing us all along."
